title: Time limit for assessment
context: ยง431:4-420 Time limit for assessment. Every subscriber of a domestic reciprocal insurer having contingent liability shall be liable for, and shall pay the subscriber&rsquo;s share of any assessment, as computed and limited in accordance with this part if: (1) While the subscriber&rsquo;s policy is in force or within one year after its termination, the subscriber is notified by either the attorney or the commissioner of the attorney&rsquo;s or the commissioner&rsquo;s intentions to levy such assessment, or (2) If an action to have a receiver, conservator, rehabilitator, or liquidator of the insurer appointed is commenced pursuant to article 15 while the subscriber&rsquo;s policy is in force or within one year after its termination.
